data.name: The Lilliputian Runner Demo
data.detailed_description:
The Lilliputian Runner™ is a skill-based platformer, where the player's goal is to find and destroy every lilliput character walking around the levels.

The demo version offers 8 playable levels.
data.about_the_game:
The Lilliputian Runner™ is a skill-based platformer, where the player's goal is to find and destroy every lilliput character walking around the levels.

The demo version offers 8 playable levels.
data.short_description: Skill-based 2D platformer with physics based puzzles. 8 levels are available in the demo version.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100T or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 640 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 630 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 630 MB available space
